title: Magnificent twisted fate's availability.
body: I've got that skin on an euw account from a hextech chest and i heard that it went on sale in 2015 halloween or something like that. Now i wanna get it on my main account as well and wondering how can i have it. Couldn't find any info about it and i really want to have it, hope anyone can help me out.

replies.body: Lew is spot on!  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news on his return, otherwise you can try your chance in hextech chests or mystery gifts!

It looks like that skin is a [legacy ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)skin so it mean it isn't usually sold in the store but there is a chance it can come back in the future.
